title: Scp 8149
content:
Item #: SCP-8149

Object Class: Safe

Name Crimson Wolf Blade

Special Containment Procedures: used a tow truck with hook and bed, currently stored in a foundation bought garage for anomalous vehicles

Description: 22 feet 10 inches long, 8 feet 11 inches wide, and 8 feet 8 inches tall. Has a unique design of an upgraded Stryker with a massive 4 pronged blade on the front with a design of a wolf head as the cover, having the body reinforced with a very strong alloy not made with earthly materials. The chassis has a unique shape with its streamline design and modified motor, able to spin the blade up front to supersonic speeds, able to create a cushion of air that can cut through steel like a hot knife through butter. Only able to access the cockpit of vehicle from the automatic door on the roof in the back of the vehicle. the key used to start the ignition is kept in a box in Dr. Sherman's office with a lock that he owns personally (SCP 8149-2). The anomalous vehicle is supposedly designed to be based off the chinese animated show "Kibaoh Klashers". Tests will be required for further analysis.
author: Hyperultimawolf
